inn1.comm: What a start! A screaming bouncer that almost had Ganguly. It leapt up at his throat, Ganguly took his eyes off the ball and fended it in an ungainly manner. The ball popped up, hung in the air for a while before dropping behind the stumps. The slips came rushing, the bowler charged after it but it landed safely
short in length, around the off stump, Ganguly eases it to the cover region
First runs of the day. On the hips, tucked away behind square leg for a single
full, straight, on the middle, Tendulkar goes right across to wrist it away past square leg
Full and fast, just outside the off stump, Tendulkar covers the off stump before shouldering arms
slightly short in length, in the zone outside the off stump, left alone
Full and wide, Ganguly goes after it, gets a inside edge past the stumps. The two had a bit of go at each other at The Oval.
Full in length ,angling away from Ganguly who punches it on the up to left of backward point but Ian Bell dives to make a very good stop
short in length, on the middle stump line, Ganguly jabs at it, another inside edge, and the ball runs off to the short fine leg region
full-pitched, on the off stump, Tendulkar stays back, and pushes it to point
on the middle and leg, not much movement, tickled to square leg.
Full-pitched again but this time it drifts on to the leg and middle region and Tendulkar flicks it past square leg

Hello?! Ganguly seems rather edgy today. It was short in length, only slightly mind you, on the middle stump line and he went for a rather ambitious pull and missed it completely. The ball rammed into the thigh pad

Ouch. Ganguly is hit on the helmet. A sharp bouncer and Ganguly went for a pull but was beaten by the pace. The ball hits him on the side of the left temple. The helmet is off and he is in pain. Anderson is gunning for Ganguly today.
another one that climbs up nastily, this time, on the middle and leg line, Ganguly is about to duck, spots that the ball is chest-high and just stabs it away at the last minute.
Another bouncer, at the right shoulder, Ganguly pulls, gets a top edge and it balloons over square leg.
fullish, on the off stump line, Tendulkar leans forward to ease it through covers
full and outside off, pushed to cover
Full, on a length, on the stumps but Ganguly, as he does in ODIs, backs away to the leg side and knifed it on the up over extra cover
Oh... he drifts down the leg side and Ganguly tickles it fine. Very fine. Four more. India on the go here.
beaten. It landed on a length, outside the off stump and went away, Ganguly didn't move his feet and had a wild waft at it.

And again. Again the feet were struck adhesively to the crease - Fevicol should consider signing him up - and he had a wild flash.  Jokes apart, Ganguly has been in pretty good form in the series. He has timed the ball rather well, only today, he is going too hard at them.
lands on a length, around the middle stump line, shapes in and evades the intended clip shot to the leg side and thuds into the thigh pad
fuller, on the off stump line, driven to mid-off
on the middle and leg line, on a length, worked to square leg
short in length, outside the off stump, Tendulkar goes back and across, puts his bat out, away from the body,  gets an inside-edge onto his pads.
again a touch short in length, outside the off stump, Tendulkar pushes it towards point
Tendulkar breaks free with a pull shot. He swiveled nicely on the front foot to pull a bouncer to the long leg region. One bounce and over the ropes.
tip and run. Ganguly leans forward to a length delivery and taps it gently to the off side and off they rush across for a quick single
climbs up from short of length, outside the off stump, Tendulkar stands tall to get on top of it and jabs it away to the off side
similar delivery and Tendulkar tries to upper cut it away and adjusts to place it to the point region
Another bouncer and Ganguly is in trouble again. Another weak pull shot, another edge - this time a top edge- and it flies over the 'keeper's head

Ganguly is having a lucky day. He should have tried his luck with betting on the horses. Another short one, over the middle stump, Ganguly backs away to the leg side, tries to upper cut it over the off side but only manages to lob it over backward point and some how, it lands safely
His luck runs out finally. Full in length, slanting away from him and he had a lame poke at it with an open-face of the bat and it went low to the second slip.
in the zone outside the off stump, left alone
gets off the mark with a dab to third man

almost caught and bowled. Full-pitched, on the middle stump line, Tendulkar goes back, rather than forward, tries to wrist it away and ends up scooping it uppishly to the right of Anderson who can't reach it
beaten. Full and outside the off stump, Tendulkar goes down on his knee and tries to dispose it through the off side field. No contact though.
short in length, just outside the off stump, Tendulkar goes back and across, gets on top of the bounce and pushes it away to the off side.
Full in length, angling away from Gambhir who lets it go through to the 'keeper
again a touch of extra bounce, outside the off stump, Gambhir tries to cut it but the ball bounces over the blade

Almost a run out. On the middle and leg, pushed to the on side, after a little hesitation he sets off for a single. Broad is quickly across, picks up and fires in a throw at the non-striker's end but misses. Gambhir would have been a goner had it hit. Instead, he gets four overthrows. Tendulkar called him over and Gambhir responded. Risky.
on a length, around the off stump, pushed to extra cover
full in length, slanting away from Gambhir who shoulders arms

fullish, just outside the off stump, Tendulkar is rooted to the back foot - the length demanded he come forward but the extra bounce on this track is making him go back to nearly every ball - mistimes a drive to the leg side. He wanted to thrash it through the off
on the middle, Tendulkar goes back and across to clip it to square leg
on the middle and off, defended to the off side
full in length, Gambhir is a touch late in moving forward and mistimes a cover drive.

short in length, outside the off stump, shapes in, Tendulkar shuffles across to defend but is beaten by the incoming delviery and the ball bounds off the flap of the pad to Prior. They appeal for a catch. It's not Christmas yet.
lands on the off and middle, angles away, left alone
bouncer, on the off stump line, Gambhir drops his wrists, gets the bat off the line and sways away
another bouncer, on the off stump line, Gambhir goes for a pull shot but can't connect
short in length, outside the off stump line, slapped to point. Powerfully cut but straight to the fielder
short in length, pushed to cover
back of a length outside leg stump and he tucks that down to Monty at deep fine
back of a length, angled across off and he watchfully leaves well enough alone
this time its a touch fuller and Gambhir quickly pushes off the front foot, but finds the man at cover
good length, going across Gambhir, who hustles to jab the bat down on it as it passes and picks the gap backward of gully
full delivery, off stumpish, pushed back down the track
back of a length, good lift and carry as for the 'keeper as it swings in sharply, but Tendulkar's been around for some time and knows where his off stump is, leaving comfortably
bangs it in short and Gambhir slaps it away for one backward of square, that ball was clocked at 87mph
good placement, getting it to kick off a good length and Tendulkar hops up in defence
back of a length, angling into Tendulkar, who hops and goes for the cute little shuffle-and-flick but the ball catches him high on the knee roll, a muted appeal from big Freddie
there we go! Tendulkar backs away to leg and slaps Flintoff' short delivery up and over backward square for four, wasnt in complete control of that shot
and again! Tendulkar makes room and goes just over cover's head, deciding to go for Flintoff's short-pitched stuff and picks up four more
and this time he makes room to late-cut but the ball hurries onto him and he makes a mess of the attempted shot, the ball sneaking back past leg stump, edgy stuff here
good length, goes back and defends to Collingwood at point
back of a length, hops up and gently places it wide of Collingwood this time for one down towards third man
length ball on about leg stump, going away and Gambhir hurries to tap it to point, 'NO' is the call

oh superb catch from Wright! Gambhir swivels uneasily, latching onto a short of a length delivery just outside off stump, the ball comes off the bottom of the bat and flies low and fast to Wright at square leg, who times his dive forward brilliantly and plucks it inches off the ground!
good length well outside off stump, he leaves along easily
back of a length outside off, Dravid shoulders arms and thats the end of a successful over for Anderson
short delivery going down leg sharply, forcing Tendulkar up and he mistimes his attempted nudge as the ball hurries onto him, popping up off the pad for a second and dropping on the pitch
back of a length again, he hops up and taps it towards point

and it works! That ball was quick, pitching back of a length outside off stump and jagging in, Dravid hops up and tries to drop the bat out of harms way but theres a noise as ball passes him, it deviates sharply and Prior collects moving to his left, they all go up in appeal and Aleem Dar nods his head and raises the finger! Dravid isnt happy at all, the ball bounced well and he seems to say the bat flicked his pad...
and hes welcomed with a short-pitched delivery that kicks up sharply and has him  hopping
oh ho ho! Welcome, he says, banging one in short and getting Yuvraj hopping around in his crease, the ball seaming past his bat as he manages to get out of the way
and another short ball outside off forces him up and beats him
inswinger, full, he goes for the drive and gets beaten
back of a length, pushed off the back foot to Bell in the covers
another short delivery on the stumps, he shuffles and plays it uppishly towards midwicket, the bowlers steaming in and bowling em short now
full delivery, driven hard back down the track, Anderson gets boot on it and stops four
short and wide, he cracks it hard but on the bounce to the man at cover
full this time, Tendulkar gets well forward and defends to cover
back of a length outside off, he gets in line and defends watchfully
good length on middle and off, turned to midwicket
sharp delivery on off stump, Tendulkar gets up quickly and does well to turn that into the ground in front of square leg, he wants one but Yuvraj loudly turns down the run
streaky! Flintoff pitches it up, Tendulkar waits for movement but there isnt any and the ball takes the thick outside edge and screams away down to third man

gone, but how! Flintoff pitches full again, outside off stump, Tendulkar drives loosely, bat misses ball completely, instead the bat clips the pad as he goes through with the shot, they appeal for the catch from Prior and Aleem Dar pulls off a shocking dismissal! Wow, there was no bat on ball whatsoever and Tendulkar is livid. Another bad dismissal in this long summer of competitive cricket.
back of a length down leg stump, he shuffles and plays it down
good length down leg, clipped around the corner
back of a length just outside off stump, he waits on it and pushes into the covers for a quick single, very quick in fact as Yuvraj just makes his crease
good length on middle and off, he gets up and tucks it to square leg
hello and goodbye! Short delivery, and in a flash he swivels and pulls that high and handsome over deep midwicket for maximum
short of a length, lifts and he pushes off the back foot, uneasily, and the ball pops up and falls safely in front of cover
oh ho! He goes for another swish to one lifting outside off and misses
fuller length, he gets forward and defends
good length outside off stump, he waits on it and pushes it past backward point
full on middle and leg, turned past midwicket for a brace
full again, worked to fine leg for one
good length outside off stump, he pokes at it and gets an outside edge that falls short of second slip
full delivery outside off, he leans into it and squeezes it into the gap at cover
good bowling! Back of a length, coming in and going sharply over middle and off stump as Yuvraj bravely decides to shoulder arms
good length, he gets forward and pushes it back down the track
angled on leg and going down, he tries the flick but the ball clips the pad and escapes for four leg-byes
too full on the legs, clipped in the air down towards deep backward square
back of a length on off stump, he gets up and uses the soft hands to turn it into the gap between midwicket and square leg for one
short of a length outside off, he sees the width and though cramped for room slightly, chop-steers it down to third man for a single
back of a length outside off stump, he gets across and defends off the back foot back down the track
back of a length outside off, tapped to cover
steams in, bangs it in short, Uthappa shimmies down and tries to pull, the ball screams over his head and Flintoff has plenty of advice for him...good aggression!
good length, off stump, Uthappa gets up tall and plays it to the on side, thats a no-ball so India can add one to their total
good shot, Uthappa cashing in one a fractionally overpitched delivery and square-driving excellent for four, on the up
another overstep from Flintoff, the balls short on the stumps and Uthappa is hurried up onto the toes as he tries to work it away fine
bounces him again, but down leg, and Uthappa confidently hooks that down to fine leg for four, thats a great cricketing shot, dont see many these days
fuller this time, outside off, and Uthappa pushes it to point
good ball! Short and very quick outside off, tempting Uthappa to fish for it, the ball deviates past the bat and they ask the question but Aleem Dar shakes his head
full in length, on the off and middle, Yuvraj stands tall to punch it to mid-off
slightly slower, on the off stump again, Yuvraj waits on the ball and chops it to third man
It's Uthappa's turn to play that dab shot to third man.
full in length, on the off and middle, defended on the front foot
a touch short in length, around the off stump, pushed to deep cover
a touch short in length, shaping in from outside off, Uthappa looks to punch it away to the on side but ends up pushing it back to the bowler
full in length, outside the off stump, Yuvraj leans forward, opens the bat-face and guides it past point
short in length, outside the off stump, Uthappa shuffles right across, gets close to the line and taps it to third man.
on the hips, clipped to deep square leg
beaten Short and rising, outside off, Uthappa tries to upper cut it but makes  no contact
slightly short and the impetuous  Uthappa goes for a pull shot but ends up mistiming it to midwicket
short in length, outside off stump, Uthappa cuts it past backward point and by the time the wide third man gets across, he runs two
fullish, outside off, driven to mid-off.
full in length, angling away from Yuvraj who waits on the ball before cutting it to backward point.
again slanting away from him and Yuvraj tries to force it off the back foot but ends up edging it to the off side
another one full in length and outside off, Yuvraj stays back, bends his back knee a touch and cuts it to deep point
shapes in towards middle and off, Uthappa shuffles across, plays it on the up towards midwicket

again that shuffle across, gets behind the line to a delivery on the off and middle and turns it to mid-on. Good nagging line. If he bowls it on the middle or middle and leg, Uthappa, by that shuffle, would be able to wrist it behind square
gets a single with a nudge to square leg
short in length, homing in on the off stump line, dabbed to point
Slightly short in length , on the off stump line and Uthappa is quick to rock back and pulls it away to left of deep midwicket. The 100 is up.
fuller, lands outside leg stump, moves in towards leg stump, Yuvraj fails to connect with his flick shot
another shortish delivery, another pull shot. It was on the off stump line and he pulls it through wide mid-on. Monty gives the chase and they get three.
on the middle and leg, worked behind square leg for a single
full in length, just outside off, Yuvraj leans forward to defend towards cover
full and straighter, on the off stump line, driven to left of mid-off for a quick single

And Uthappa combusts. Full and outside off, it was a slower one,  Uthappa loses patience and slashes it uppishly straight to mid-off. It was in the slot allright but instead of driving it through extra cover, he tried to clear mid-off and paid the penalty. The bat-face shut a touch and he didn't get his placement or timing right.
full, homing in on the off stump line, defended to the on side

loud shout for lbw as a full-length delivery beats an intended defensive stroke. The ball hit Dhoni in front of the off stump and it would have crashed into the stumps. The umpire must have thought it hit him outside the line
beaten Flighted delivery outside off stump, Yuvraj goes for a drive but the ball drifted away
turns in from outside off, Yuvraj goes back to push it away to extra cover
full, drifting on the leg and middle, Dhoni is on the front foot and turns it past square leg
straighter one. On the middle and off, drifts in, Yuvraj tries to turn it to the on side and gets a leading edge, along the ground, back to the bowler
fuller, straighter, driven to long-on for a single.
from wide of the crease, angling away from Yuvraj who dabs it to the off side
length delivery, on the off and middle, defended off the back foot
similar delivery and Yuvraj pushes it to cover
beaten Full in length, lands just outside off stump, angles away, Yuvraj shaped to cut it before withdrawing his bat away. By that time the ball had squeezed past the outside edge.
on the off stump line, pushed to cover

full in length, just outside off stump, Yuvraj square drives to backward point. He likes to sit on the back foot and cut those full deliveries angling away. Many a player would like to drive those through covers. Not Yuvraj.
drifting in from round the stumps, driven back to Monty
just outside off stump, pushed to point. There is a silly-point in place
flatter, quicker, on the off and middle, Dhoni goes back to punch it to the off side
another one that comes in with the arm, punched back to the bowler
drifts in towards middle. Dhoni lunges forward, takes care to take the front foot out of the line, pushes to extra cover
leans forward to defend a full length delivery on the middle to the on side
full, on the middle and off, Dhoni tries to push it to the off side, the ball rolls away to the on side r
on the middle stump line, Dhoni stays adjacent to the line and pushes it to cover
fuller, on the off and middle again, Dhoni drives, the bat-face shuts, and the ball rolls towards mid-on
on the middle line, worked to midwicket for a single
beaten It was in the temptation zone outside off, Yuvraj had a lame poke at it. Almost fatal.
he thrusts his right foot out to a length delivery on the off stump and drives to long-on.
flighted on the off stump line, pushed to extra cover for a single
on the middle and leg, full, Dhoni again takes the front foot outside the line - he is very wary of getting trapped lbw - defends to the off side
slightly short, on the off and middle, swatted back to the bowler
drifts in on the off stump line, pushed to extra cover
flighted on the middle and off stump line and Yuvraj went down his knee and proposed. Er.. swept it flat and hard to long leg boundary. It was the first boundary in 10 overs.
leans forward, reaches the pitch and drives to long-on
beaten. In the corridor outside off and Yuvraj is beaten on the square drive

That's a big wicket. Huge blow to India. Yuvraj Singh is gone. It lands on a length, around the off and middle line and angles away, Yuvraj steers it straight to Collingwood who had placed himself at third slip position.
short in length, on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
fuller, drifting to the legs, tries to flick it away but it runs off the pads
another failed flick shot, another leg bye
full in length, just outside off stump, driven to mid-off
on the hips, with a bit of bounce, Powar is expecting a bouncer and goes right back and manages to work it away to fine leg

beaten On a length and holding its line outside off stump, Dhoni pushes inside the line and is beaten. Flintoff does this often. With his angle and action, the batsmen think its going to come in more than it does. Dravid fell to one such delivery at the Old Trafford
goes back to push a short-of-length delivery past point
short in length, just outside off stump, Dhoni goes back and across to punch it to cover
full-pitched on the off and middle, driven straight down the ground.
fullish, on the off and middle, Powar shuffles across and drives to mid-on
on the off and middle line, Powar wrists it behind square leg.
stifled shout for lbw as Dhoni is beaten on the forward prod. Struck outside line, though.
makes proper contact with a full length delivery this time but hits straight to mid-off
full again, just outside off stump, Dhoni leans forward to ease it to deep cover
on the hips, tucked to square leg
short in length, outside the off stump, rises almost chest-high, swatted to the off side
full in length, outside off stump, left alone
on the off stump line, slightly short in length, guided to backward point

on the off stump line, again a touch short, guided to third man. Powar seems to be expecting a bouncer every ball. He stays outside leg stump and hence even if he is playing a delivery on the stumps, it appears as if he is playing well away from the body.
on the middle stump line, dabbed to square leg
short in length, outside off stump, slapped to point. It almost carried to Pietersen at point.
goes back to a short of length delivery and places it into the gap at extra cover
leans forward, pushes a length delivery towards point and wants a single. Dhoni is not in a suicidal mood and sends him back
on the middle stump line, worked to the leg side
full in length, outside off stump, Powar swats it over the bowler's head. A wild slap.
on the off stump line, defended on the front foot.
tossed up on a length, turned straight to midwicket
a touch flatter just outside off stump, Dhoni comes forward and pushes to cover
tossed up, Dhoni leans forward and cant beat cover again
pushes it through a bit too wide and Dhoni reaches out, slapping it past gully
quicker on middle and off, flicked to midwicket
flattish delivery on middle and off, Powar gets the front foot forward and turns it to midwicket
fullish delivery outside off stump, Dhoni cracks it with too much bottom-hand to cover
short and wide, he gets up and hits it into the gap at cover this time
too full down leg stump and Powar helps it on its way with a flick to fine leg
fullish outside off stump, coming on and catching Powar on the front pad as he tries to flick it through square leg, gets some bat on it though
similar line and length and he again tries to flick but mistimes the shot
full outside off stump, plants the leg forward and drives to Bell in the covers

tossed up on off stump, Dhoni drives hard straight back down the track, Monty gets a hand on it and the ball ricochets onto the nonstrikers stumps, they refer the run out appeal and the frame-by-frame replays show Powar is just back over the line, loud cheers as NOT-OUT flashes on the big screen

gone this time however! Tossed up on leg stump, Dhoni gets forward and tucks it fine, setting off for the sharp single towards square leg, Powar scampers down the track and realizes he's struggling, then decides to dive full stretch but he's short this time as Prior collects a good throw from Shah and flicks the stumps, and thats India's seventh wicket down on 147
tossed up outside off stump, he flicks well but cant beat Bell
tossed up full outside off stump, Chawla gets well forward and defends
tossed up nicely, he defends forward, the ball turns sharply and raps the front leg before dropping short of slip
tossed up again, well outside off, Chawla gets a good stride forward and takes it full on the pad, a muted appeal from all and thats a maiden over from Monty
good length outside off stump, Dhoni punches off the back foot and Bell dives at cover to save runs
full and a touch wide, he kneels down and steers it towards backward point for a sharp single
good length, angling away from off, Chawla gets forward and pushes with an open face but Collingwood is too sharp at backward point

smart stumping! Similar delivery, pushed across Chawla, who drives lustily and misses, dragging the back foot forward and Prior, after collecting nicely, whips off the bails just before Chawla could drag the foot back in, neatly done to get rid of India's eighth batsman
full delivery, drawing Zaheer forward only to beat his defensive shot
identical delivery, this time the ball connects with bat, Zaheer again poking tentatively at it, but theres a thick outside edge that drops just short of slip and runs away for four
back of a length, wide, but Dhoni cant connect with his wild swing
short outside off stump, Dhoni swivels on one leg and pulls into the ground through square leg for a single that gets Zaheer exposed to the big man
short delivery, well pitched outside off stump and moving away from Zaheer, who shuffles across and then drops the hands to let it pass safely by
short of a length again, Zaheer gets up and across and defends it down well, and Flintoff's overstepped for a fourth time in the game

another short delivery, defended to Collingwood at point and he sets off, Dhoni has a few steps down and then says are you mad, and Zaheer turns back and makes his ground with some ease as Collingwood's throw misses the stumps
fuller delivery on off stump, Zaheer gets back in his crease and drops bat on it, keeping it out to Collingwood again
short of a length again, getting Zaheer up on the toes, defending, and the outside edge runs along the ground through the vacant gully region for one to get Zaheer back on strike next over
short of a length, again Zaheer gets tall and defends it down
back of a length, he covers off and pushes to Collingwood's left, but he moves quickly, dives, stops, and turns to cancel any notions of a single
a bit of width on offer but Zaheer cant connect with his swish
dropped by someone who normally doesnt do so! Short and wide again, this time Zaheer does connect with a cut and Collingwood, at point, dives to his right and lets it through his fingers
short delivery, he gets back and defends
short again, good lift on that one as Zaheer gets up on his toes and flirts with it, only to get beaten and Broad puts hands to mouth
flat delivery on middle and off, driven back to Monty's left, and he stops it
flat again, more leg stump, tucked through the gap at square leg for a well-run two out to Mascarenhas, moving around in the deep
short and wide, cut hard into the ground through covers out to Flintoff at sweeper, shouts of "catch it!" from Prior, for some odd reason
quicker delivery, catching Zaheer outside the line of off stump, Monty half-appeals
served up full again, this time he comes forward and defends comfortably
bowled 'em! Monty tosses it up on middle and off, Zaheer goes for a regulation tail-end swipe across the line, misses, and loses his stumps for Monty to break into celebration! India are nine down...
short and wide, Dhoni throws the kitchen sink and then some at it, but cant connect
short and wide again, now Dhoni connects, uppercutting over the fielders and out to Monty, running along from third man, for a couple to his name
again short and wide and Dhoni cuts it to Collingwood at point, on the bounce
good shot! Broad tries another short delivery, just outside off stump or thereabouts, and Dhoni pulls hard through deep fine leg and deep square leg
full delivery on the stumps, Dhoni kneels down and drives, but mistimes the shot to leg
full delivery on off stump, Dhoni gets forward and turns it sotfly into midwicket and runs hard to keep the strike
tossed up on middle and leg, Dhoni makes room and then drives to mid-on
tossed up on middle and off, Dhoni drives back to the bowler
grip and turn as Monty tosses it on a length and beats Dhoni outside off
too short and Dhoni cracks that uppishly to cover-point, denying the single
well bowled again, not giving Dhoni room and he drives to the fielder
good stuff from Monty, holding the length back a touch, Dhoni makes room and cuts but straight to backward point and thats a maiden, so RP will have to face now
full delivery, he gets forward and drives back down the ground, Broad sticks his left hand out and the ball rolls to mid-off
back of a length, RP gets back and drives back to Broad again
bit of width and he frees the arms, slashing safely over gully for one out to Monty in the deep
back of a length outside off, hit off the back foot to Bell in the covers
overpitched on middle and leg, the attempted yorker ending up a low full toss, which Dhoni drives, taking a hand off the bat, down to long-on
another low full toss, on off stump, which RP drives nicely to mid-on
tossed up full, Dhoni takes it and hammers it dead straight, with fierce power, and almost knocks Aleem Dar off his feet, the ball screaming down the ground for four
tossed up outside off stump, Dhoni reaches for it and drives to cover
too much room on offer, Dhoni frees up and cuts smack through backward point, who gives chase, but the ball beats two men in the deep
tossed up on middle and leg, he gets a good stride in and defends, the ball popping up off the pad
short again, Dhoni cuts through the covers out to Flintoff at sweeper
good ball, pitching on a length and spinning past his defence
and he's welcomed with an old-fashioned slog back over mid-on's head for six
slower ball ends up wide and Dhoni drives to cover, where a misfield from Bell allows Dhoni to sprint back for the second, well run
slow and full again, he comes out and drives, mistiming via the inside-edge to short fine leg and he turns down the single
short and wide, slow ball once more, Dhoni tries to cut but misses, the ball bounces in front of Prior
low full toss, Dhoni hits it wide of mid-on and runs the single that gets him a 14th one-day half-century, well played
full delivery on the stumps, RP kneels down and goes for a drive, the inside-edge rolls back to Anderson's left and he fields
attempted yorker outside off, driven back to mid-off and Dhoni says no to RP
another yorker-length ball on off stump, Dhoni drives to mid-off once again, good bowling from Flintoff

good catch in the deep! Dhoni slogs a fullish delivery and mistimes it over the covers and mid-off, the ball's up in the air for some time and Anderson, moving to his left and running around from long-off, watches the ball brilliantly and times his dive to perfection, cupping his hands and holding on to end India's innings at 187

inn2.comm: Starts off with a ball in the zone outside off stump, Prior lets that one go through to Dhoni.
slipping on to the pads, Prior shuffles across, tries to glance it but it runs off the pad. RP Singh can't get across in time

Huge appeal for lbw. Full in length, on the middle stump line and straightened a touch and Prior went for a loose drive; the bat came outside the line and the ball crashed into the pad. Close. Very close. Did he get an inside edge? The replays don't confirm that.
down the leg side. Poor follow-up delivery.
stifled shout for lbw. The ball landed outside the legstump and moved towards leg, Prior fell over a touch as he tried to flick and was rapped on the pad
on the stumps again, nagging line, Prior offers the full face of the bat in defense

and again. Prior has developed this habit of shuffling across and that gets him into dangerous position. It's not as if he is a wristy player who can whip the fullish deliveries on middle to the square leg boundary.

It lands on a length, on the middle stump line, Luke Wright plonked his front foot forward and across and got into a tangle. He tried to play around the front pad and was struck on the knee roll in front of the middle. They appeal for a lbw. Perhaps, the forward stride meant the ball might have gone above the stumps.
Way ... way outside the off stump. Dhoni can't get across.

RP gets his man this time. A sharp bouncer, angling away from Wright, who tries to fetch it from there - a weak pull shot- and it just lobs up for RP to come under it. He was on his way back to the pavilion as soon as he hit it: he knew he'd gone
short in length, outside the off stump, Bell pushes it, away from the body, to third man

Another one goes down. India are running hot here. In the zone outside the off stump, from a length and Prior seems to be in trance and just pokes at it. Fatal edge. He slams his bat into his pads as he walks off, furious with himself. He's really marching back to the pavilion now.
Full, around the middle and off stump, Pietersen carefully nudges it to the on side.
a sharp bouncer to end the fab over. It was on the right shoulder and Pietersen just sways away at the last minute.
on the off stump, on a length, defended on the front foot.
lands on a length, on the leg and middle, moves in towards middle, Bell shuffles across, gets behind the line and works it to midwicket.
this one goes away from Bell who lets Dhoni come into play. There is a buzz around the arena.

on the middle stump line, straightening a touch, turned to midwicket. Bell is playing carefully here, on a good day, he would have wristed it past square leg. Here, he is just defending towards midwicket.
fullish, on the off and middle line, goes on with the angle. Bell gets almost squared-up and stabs at it. A touch late in leaning forward and he adjusted to the movement.
similar line but this time Bell is quick to get into position and eases it to the off side

Full in length, on the off and middle, Pietersen's defensive poke brings the bat outside the line and gets an inside-edge behind square leg. By the time Zaheer runs in, Pietersen rushes across for the second. He makes it just in time.
on a length, moving away outside off stump, Pietersen tries to punch it on the up but is no position to do so and the ball rolls away.
full in length, around the off stump, Pietersen leans forward to push it to the left of mid-off. Gooch is on the air and thinks Pietersen should open in the ODIs.
full and on the off and middle line, going with the angle and again Bell is a touch indecisive and late in getting forward and gets an thickish outside edge, down to third man
wide outside the off stump.
And this time he slips down the leg side. Another wide.
well outside the off stump but not wide enough to be called wide.
closer to the off stump, Pietersen moves towards the line, pushes it gently towards Ramesh Powar at mid-off and completes a quick run

fullish, on the off and middle line - the line and the length that is troubling both pietersen and Bell - Pietersen tries to whip it across the line and gets a thick outside edge through point. Chawla makes a mess at the boundary and ives away an extra run
on the middle stump, holding its line, pushed to the on side.
nice nagging line, just outside the off stump, just short of a drivable length, Bell knows where his off stump and shoulders arms
on a length, just outside the off stump, Bell goes back and across, stands tall to fist it away through backward point. This time Chawla picks the ball cleanly
short in length, lands on the middle and leg, moves towards middle, Bell goes back to defend it to the on side
fuller, on the off and middle, defended on the front foot.
Full and on that off and middle line, Pietersen eases forward to drive it to mid-off.
lands on a length, on the leg stump line, moves towards middle and off, Pietersen gets behind the line to defend it down the track.
on the off stump line, on a length, pushed back to the bowler who throws it, over Pietersen's head,  to Dhoni.
slightly short in length, around that off stump again but that length meant Pietersen could stand up tall and punch it on the up. However, he hits it straight to mid-off
leans forward, drops it close, towards extra  cover and rushes across for a quick but comfortable single
homing in on that off stump, Bell gets behind the line to ease it to the off side. Tight over that.
full-pitched on the off stump, square driven to right of point and Yuvraj fires in a throw at the non-striker's end but misses. Pietersen would have made it anyway
full in length, on the off stump line, mistimes a drive to cover
full in length, outside off stump and Bell glides forward to cream it  on the up to the left of mid-off
hits the deck short of length, on the middle and off and it moves away, Bell arrests his forward movement and has a lame poke at it . Almost fatal.
lands on a length, on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
banged in short, around the off stump and Bell gets into a nice position to pull it away to deep square leg boundary.
on the legs and Pietersen flicks it powerfully past square leg
full-pitched outside the off stump, driven to cover
Fine stop at cover by Uthappa. Slightly short in length, Pietesen cracks it on the up to left of cover where Robin dives full-length to make the stop
fullish, on the off stump line and Pietersen glides towards the line and whips it towards mid-on. And hello? Chawla misfields it again.
A short delivery and Bell spanks it in front of square. The last ball of the previous over was also a short-pitched delivery that didn't climb too much. Easy pickings.
better from Zak. Full in length, on the off stump line, going with the angle, Pietersen tries to play on the up and edges it to third man
in the zone outside off stump, left alone.
on the middle and off stump line, just short of a driveable length and Bell is squared-up a touch but adjusts his wrists to push it away to the off side
another poor short-pitched delivery that just rose waist-high and Bell had no problem is pulling it front of square. Three pull shots and three boundaries. Bell is moving along rather nicely here.
homing in on the off stump, defended to the off side
huge shout for lbw. But the ball was going down legside. Full, from round the stumps, on the middle and leg, Bell tries to flick but fails to connect
full and down the leg side. The extras keep climbing.
short, bit of width outside off and Pietersen simply smoked it imperiously through the off side. A fierce slap.
full in length, on the middle stump line, driven back to the bowler
full in length, outside the off stump, driven to the on side
on the middle stump line, a tad short in length and that was enough for Pietersen to go back and whip it through midwicket.
full in length, outside the off stump, edged to third man
width on offer and Bell drives to cover
bit wider and he slaps that through point
quicker and flatter on middle and leg, Bell drives to midwicket
full, on-driven to mid-on
tossed up, off driven to Uthappa, who misfields and allows the run
tossed up on a length, Pietersen defends forward
rubbish ball, short on off stump, easily pulled through midwicket for four
short and wide, he cuts hard but Yuvraj at point dives and gets a hand on it, saving runs there
fuller, moving in from outside off stump and catches Pietersen defending, little shout from Dhoni but no harm done
full again, Pietersen leans into a drive and inside-edges back onto the boot
full again, Pietersen drives and the ball rolls to midwicket
once again he pitches full and Pietersen doesnt play it convincingly, the ball popping up off the front leg and dying near his feet
tossed up, he leans forward and drives to mid-off for one
good ball! The legbreak rips off a length and beats Pietersen, walking into it
full delivery and Pietersen almost yorks himself walking across the stumps, the inside-edge sneaks past leg stump
floated up wide, and he leaves it be
tossed up, he comes forward and drives to mid-off
tosses up the wrong 'un and Pietersen doesnt read it well
back of a length, he gets up and drives to cover
fuller, Pietersen drives straight and mid-off fields
good length, he gets up and drives to the man at cover
good length on middle and off, worked across the stumps to Tendulkar on the leg side
back of a length, he gets up and defends
fuller, moving in, he drives across the line and gets an edge that flies down to a diving Chawla at third man
tossed up on the stumps, Bell drives back to Chawla, making room
tossed up fuller, catches Bell on the pad, outside the line of leg stump
full again, Bell gets forward and defends watchfully
pitches full and spins away, Bell has to really reach out and slaps it to Uthappa at mid-off, who dives over it and allows a run
flatter on middle and off, played across the front leg for one to square leg
gives it some air, Bell likes the length and frees the arms, hitting safely and very high over mid-off, the ball lands inches inside the boundary
full outside off, Pietersen defends with an inside-edge yet again
good length outside off, watchfully played to backward point off the front foot
good length on off stump, he plays across the line but cant beat square leg
good stuff from Ganguly, no room to work with but Pietersen just taps it into the covers for a quick single
back of a length on middle and leg, worked away to Zaheer at deep backward square leg for one more

run out! Back of a length again, he shuffles and works it to midwicket, Pietersen shows some interest in the run but sees Tendulkar swooping in on the ball, theres a bit of yes-no-maybe-so before Bell turns back and runs, Ganguly rushes back to collect a low and slow return and breaks the stumps just before Bell's outstretched bat reaches the line, big, big wicket that for India as a result of some indecisive calling from the two batsmen. Pietersen totally sold Bell down the river, starting for the run and then with Bell committed checked, leaving Bell with nowhere to go
tossed up, outside off, spins away and he leaves it be
full, straighter one, dabbed away
tossed up full again, uses the feet and drives back to Chawla
good ball, pitching on a length and beating his bat
flatter length, worked to the fielder on the on-side
tossed up, Collingwood gets forward and drives to cover
full length, Pietersen looks to drive off-side but gets an inside-edge to midwicket
full again, outside off, he drives off the front foot to cover
good length, a touch wider, steered past a diving Yuvraj at point for one
back of a length, Collingwood stands rooted and pokes at it, the ball runs down to third man for a single
good length, off stumpish, Pietersen gets tall and defends down to the off
drifts to leg and Pietersen whips it out to Gambhir at deep midwicket
tossed up, he comes forward and defends back to Chawla
good stuff, bowled on middle stump and it spins past Pietersen, lunging forward, nice drift in and then breaking away sharply
fuller, he comes down and drives hard to mid-off, sprints for the run and just manages to beat Zaheer's throw
good ball again, full and drifting into leg stump, then pitches and spins away, clipping the back leg before Dhoni takes and appeals for a catch
too short, Collingwood cuts hard but cant beat Yuvraj at point
tossed up, its the wrong 'un, not picked too well but its going down leg, off the pad to short leg and they all appeal
good length, defended to cover off the front foot
fullish length, driven straight down the ground with plenty of bottom-hand, Powar moves across and fields from mid-off
length ball outside off, played to the fielder
full on leg stump, Collingwood whips it through the vacant square leg out to Chawla in the deep for a pair
full and straight, nicely driven back and Zaheer stops it with his left hand
full on leg again, and he flicks it to Chawla for a single this time
drifting on the leg stump line and Collingwood manages to squeeze it out
almost gets his man with a googly. Collingwood shaped to cut and was alarmed to see the ball break back in but adjusted to stab it to point
That's a biggie. Pietersen goes downtown. He charged down the track, reached the pitch and drove the ball long and hard over long-off.
another charge down the track but Chawla sees him coming and sends across a slider and Pietersen adjuts to jab it away
another move down the track and this time Chawla bowls a googly and Pietersen manages to work it behind square leg.
slightly short and crack: a slap past point. Four more. Big over this.
short in length, on the off and middle, stabbed away behind square leg
shout for lbw. Full in length, shapes in from outside off stump, Collingwood shuffesl across, misses a forward prod and the ball thuds into the thigh pad. Just going over the off stump.
another one that comes in with that angle from round the stumps, turned to midwicket
lands on a length, outside the off stump, comes in again, Collingwood takes care not to press the front leg across and pushes it to the on side
fuller, outside the off stump, holds its line a touch, Collingwood pushes inside the line and gets an outside edge to third man
from wide of the crease, angling in towards middle, Pietersen whips it to square leg. He had got into a nice position and had he got his placement right, he would have got a four.
slightly short and outside the off stump, cut through backward point
on the off stump line, leans forward to push it to point
full and on the middle stump line, defended on the front foot
slow through the air, spins in from outside off, Pietersen tries to force it off the back foot but was beaten by the lack of pace and gets a inside-edge to the on side.
flighted on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
on that off stump line, moving in from outside, pushed to the off side
lands on the off stump line, moves towards middle, jabbed away. Collingwood is disconcerted with that angle. He shuffles to the off stump and tries to turn to the onside but he is not connecting well
lands outside off, shapes in but still stays outside off and Collingwood lets that one go through to Dhoni
slightly short in length, just outside the off stump, that length allowed Collingwood to stay back and just push it to the on side. He needs to get it slightly fuller
short again, outside the off stump an Collingwood square-cuts it past point. Ganguly comes across to make a diving stop near the ropes
fuller, straighter, driven to mid-on
flighted outside the off stump, 45 mph, too full and Collingwood leans forward to cream it through cover.
tossed-up, outside off, not much turn, 52.9 mph, pushed to cover
again too full and outside off stump, no bite off the track and Collingwood drives through cover. Fine stroke.
just outside the off stump, hangs in the air, pushed to the off side
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, loopy delivery, defended to the on side
full in length, Pietersen walks towards the line, drives to the left of mid-on
from wide of the crease, again a touch short in length, allows Collingwood to sit back and punch it to cover
short in length, on the off stump line, pushed to Uthappa at cover . RP Singh is bowling from round the stumps
on a length, outside the off stump, Collingwood shapes to drive, the ball moves in, makes contact with the inner half of the bat and rolls towards mid-off
similar delivery, a touch short may be, and Collingwood is contend just pushing it to the off side. RP Singh makes the stop.

A flat six. Take that. Short in length and Collingwood rocks back and plays a smashing pull shot in front of the square leg. For some reason. RP has been hitting the back of length from round the stumps and paid for it on that occasion
outside off stump, full, guided to backward point
flighted, slow through the air, outside off stump, Collingwood steps out to drive to mid-off
leans forward to whip a full delivery to right of mid-on
flatter, on the middle stump line, Pietersen comes down the track, works to right of mid-on. Fifty of the partnership comes up.
Pietersen steps out, Powar shortens the length, sends a floater  on the middle stump line, Pietersen adjusts to stab it to the on side
slides on straight after landing on a length on the off and middle line, defended to the off side
short, on the leg and middle line, Collingwood goes back to force it past square leg.
lands on the middle and off, turns away, Collingwood stays back to defend
googly on the middle and leg line, Collingwood fails to connect with his glance and it bounds off the pad
steps down the track, Chawla drags back the length and Collingwood is contend to just push it away
fullish, straight on the middle and off, driven to long-on
drifter, floater, outside the off stump, left alone
on the off stump line, side spin on it and it drifts away off the outside edge to point
full and straight, Pietersen jumps out, reaches the pitch and drives straight down the ground.
floated outside off stump, left alone.
loopy delivery, on the off stump line, dips rapidly as Pietersen leans forward and he turns it to midwicket
beaten It lands on a length, just outside leg stump and turns right across Collinwood who pokes at it tentatively and edges, along the ground, to the right of slip
googly, a tad short though and Collingwood pushes it to the off side
floats on the middle stump line, defended on the front foot
outside the off stump, steered to backward point
full, too full, slipping on to the middle and leg, Collingwood takes the front leg outside the line and whips it through midwicket
And again. Another one that drifts to the legs and Collingwood does the rest. England just require 47 to win.
That's fifty for Kevin. Full and well outside the off stump, Pietersen stretches well forward and he blasts it through cover
full and outside off stump, swept to short-leg
full and outside the off stump, pushed to the on side
really slow through the air, on the middle and leg, Pietersen is made to wait and he works it to the on side
slow and loopy delivery outside off stump, from round the stumps, Pietersen misses his sweep shot and is struck outside the off stump
full and outside the off stump, square driven past point
full, on the middle stump line, Pietersen shuffles across and flicks through midwicket
width offered outside off and Collingwood cracks it past point. England reach 150
It's Collingwood's turn to bring up the fifty. Well played skipper. Delivered from round the stumps, on the middle and leg stump, whipped through midwicket.
outside the off stump, left alone
flighted delivery outside off stump, driven to the bowler
short and quick, on the off stump line, jabbed to the on side
lands on the off stump, full and spins away past the outside edge
short and Pietersen rocks back to whip it through midwicket. England inching close to a series win
slightly short again, outside off stump, cut to deep point
leans forward to defend
short and on the off and middle, Pietersen was caught in two minds - whether to pull it or play it straight and settles for a gentle push back to the bowler
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
fuller but drifting, from round the stumps, to the leg stump line and Collingwood flicks it away. England need just 27 now.
Whack. Short and Collingwood plays a short-arm pull over midwicket. Easy.
another pull but this time down to long leg
on the leg and middle, worked to midwicket
tossed up, width, spins in and Collingwood taps it to point
tossed up again, he comes forward and pushes into the off side for one
full, Pietersen stands his ground and drives hard to Uthappa at cover
tossed up, he frees the arms and cover-drives through Uthappa this time and gets runs
straight delivery, outside off, left alone
full and wide, and he thumps that through Uthappa, diving over the ball once more, for four as England get within 15 runs of victory
back of a length, Collingwood drives to Powar in the covers
back of a length again, results in another back-foot drive to Powar
outside leg stump, clips the pad as he tries the flick and evades Dhoni too
back of a length, he shuffles and tries to nudge it to leg but gets a leading-edge that safely falls before Powar in the covers
short of a length, punched past Powar who heads after it and does well to haul it in just inside the boundary
fullish outside leg, flicked past square leg for a single
tossed up, he sweeps from outside off stump through square leg and a very, very ordinary attempt - well actually he gave up - allows four

there it is! Powar proposes, Pietersen accepts, dancing down the track and hoisting the ball high over in the air between mid-off and mid-on, its up for a while but drops safely in no mans land and the batsmen complete the three runs required to seal a series victory for England
